x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |

| 1 |  | matlmod.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 2 |  | #P_sqxpexg | |- ( N e. Fin -> ( N X. N ) e. _V ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( R freeLMod ( N X. N ) ) = ( R freeLMod ( N X. N ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_frlmlmod | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ ( N X. N ) e. _V ) -> ( R freeLMod ( N X. N ) ) e. LMod ) |

| 6 | 2, 5 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( R freeLMod ( N X. N ) ) e. LMod ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( Base ` ( R freeLMod ( N X. N ) ) ) = ( Base ` ( R freeLMod ( N X. N ) ) ) ) |
| 8 | 1, 3 | #P_matbas | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( Base ` ( R freeLMod ( N X. N ) ) ) = ( Base ` A ) ) |
| 9 | 1, 3 | #P_matplusg | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( +g ` ( R freeLMod ( N X. N ) ) ) = ( +g ` A ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_oveqdr | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) /\ ( x e. ( Base ` ( R freeLMod ( N X. N ) ) ) /\ y e. ( Base ` ( R freeLMod ( N X. N ) ) ) ) ) -> ( x ( +g ` ( R freeLMod ( N X. N ) ) ) y ) = ( x ( +g ` A ) y ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( Scalar ` ( R freeLMod ( N X. N ) ) ) = ( Scalar ` ( R freeLMod ( N X. N ) ) ) ) |

| 13 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( Scalar ` ( R freeLMod ( N X. N ) ) ) ) = ( Base ` ( Scalar ` ( R freeLMod ( N X. N ) ) ) ) |
| 14 | 1, 3 | #P_matvsca | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( .s ` ( R freeLMod ( N X. N ) ) ) = ( .s ` A ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_oveqdr | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) /\ ( x e. ( Base ` ( Scalar ` ( R freeLMod ( N X. N ) ) ) ) /\ y e. ( Base ` ( R freeLMod ( N X. N ) ) ) ) ) -> ( x ( .s ` ( R freeLMod ( N X. N ) ) ) y ) = ( x ( .s ` A ) y ) ) |
| 16 | 7, 8, 10, 11, 12, 13, 15 | #P_lmodpropd | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( ( R freeLMod ( N X. N ) ) e. LMod <-> A e. LMod ) ) |
| 17 | 6, 16 | #P_mpbid | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> A e. LMod ) |
